languages.text: "Я приношу извинения за поведение кузена, Лорд-капитан". {n}На скулах Иокасты проступают желваки.{/n} "Махарий всегда был брюзгой, но — верным династии брюзгой".
"I apologise for my cousin's behaviour, Lord Captain." {n}She grinds her teeth.{/n} "Macharius has always been a grouch, but a loyal one."
languages.original_text: "Я приношу извинения за поведение кузена, Лорд-капитан". {n}На скулах Иокасты проступают желваки.{/n} "Махарий всегда был брюзгой, но — верным династии брюзгой".

traits.locale_text: "I apologize for my brother's behaviour, Lord Captain." {n}Jocasta grinds her teeth.{/n} "Macharius has always been a grouch, but a loyal one."
"I apologize for my brother's behaviour, Lord Captain." {n}Jocasta grinds her teeth.{/n} "Macharius has always been a grouch, but a loyal one."

languages.text: « Veuillez accepter mes excuses pour le comportement de mon cousin, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}, {n}dit-elle en grinçant des dents.{/n} Macharius a toujours été particulièrement désagréable, mais il est néanmoins d'une loyauté sans faille. »
languages.original_text: "I apologise for my cousin's behaviour, Lord Captain." {n}She grinds her teeth.{/n} "Macharius has always been a grouch, but a loyal one."

traits.locale_text: « Veuillez accepter mes excuses pour le comportement de mon frère, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. {n}dit-elle en grinçant des dents.{/n} Macharius a toujours été particulièrement désagréable, mais il est néanmoins d'une loyauté sans faille. »

languages.text: «Le pido disculpas por el comportamiento de mi primo, Lord Capitán». {n}Aprieta los dientes.{/n} «Macharius siempre ha sido un cascarrabias, pero es leal».
languages.original_text: "I apologise for my cousin's behaviour, Lord Captain." {n}She grinds her teeth.{/n} "Macharius has always been a grouch, but a loyal one."

traits.locale_text: «Le pido disculpas por el comportamiento de mi hermano, Lord Capitán». {n}Aprieta los dientes.{/n} «Macharius siempre ha sido un cascarrabias, pero es leal».

languages.text: “我为我表哥的行为向您致歉，舰长大人。”{n}她把牙齿咬得格格响。{/n}“马卡里乌斯确实满口牢骚，但他的忠诚毋庸置疑。”
languages.original_text: "I apologise for my cousin's behaviour, Lord Captain." {n}She grinds her teeth.{/n} "Macharius has always been a grouch, but a loyal one."

traits.locale_text: “我为我哥哥的行为向您致歉，舰长大人。”{n}她把牙齿咬得格格响。{/n}“马卡里乌斯确实满口牢骚，但他的忠诚毋庸置疑。”

languages.text: 「私のいとこの態度について謝罪をさせてください、ロード・キャプテン」{n}彼女は歯を食いしばった。{/n}「マカリウスはいつも不機嫌だが、忠実な男だ」
languages.original_text: "I apologise for my cousin's behaviour, Lord Captain." {n}She grinds her teeth.{/n} "Macharius has always been a grouch, but a loyal one."

traits.locale_text: 「私の兄弟の態度について謝罪をさせてください、ロード・キャプテン」{n}彼女は歯を食いしばった。{/n}「マカリウスはいつも不機嫌だが、忠実な男だ」

languages.text: "Ich entschuldige mich für das Verhalten meines Cousins, Lord Captain." {n}Sie knirscht mit den Zähnen.{/n} "Macharius war schon immer ein Miesepeter, allerdings ein loyaler."
languages.original_text: "I apologise for my cousin's behaviour, Lord Captain." {n}She grinds her teeth.{/n} "Macharius has always been a grouch, but a loyal one."

traits.locale_text: "Ich entschuldige mich für das Verhalten meines Bruders, Lord Captain." {n}Sie knirscht mit den Zähnen.{/n} "Macharius war schon immer ein Miesepeter, allerdings ein loyaler."

languages.text: "Kuzenimin davranışları için özür dilerim Lord Kaptan." {n}Dişlerini sıkıyor.{/n} "Macharius her zaman mızmız biri olmuştur ama sadıktır."
languages.original_text: "I apologise for my cousin's behaviour, Lord Captain." {n}She grinds her teeth.{/n} "Macharius has always been a grouch, but a loyal one."
